mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_CATEGORY_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, 1, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'O'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, T.* FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO, B.MEMBER_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.ENROLL_DATE, B.MODIFY_DATE, B.STATUS, B.HIT, M.MEMBER_NICK FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'O' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC ) T ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{lastRow}
